meta.content: Jeopardy Archive E.A. Srere Jake Bryant Frédérique Delaprée Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6820.

td.p: E.A. Srere, an attorney and municipal judge from Dallas, Texas
Jake Bryant, a programmer and analyst from Weymouth, Massachusetts
Frédérique Delaprée, a foreign service officer from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,200)

tr.td: WOMEN ON TV
HOME, SWEET HOME
"MM"! FOOD & DRINK!
TRANSPORTATION
ANAGRAMS
PULITZER FOR FICTION AUTOCORRECTS
(Alex: You have to correct the incorrect word in each clue.)

IT HAS 2 "BU"
